preview: Markdown is a lightweight markup language for writing documents. It is lightweight, elegant and effective.  Dittio.  Is a markdown publishing system which generates a static blog from markdown documents and jupyter noteboks. Create a new blog site.
title: Getting Started
name: dit_getting_started

preview: KRT is a tool. A small light library to represents knowledge through graphs. It's goal is to be quick, frictionless way of representing knowledge. It is not prescriptive but a tool that gives the author the ability to describe, represent and evolve their current mental model of a domain. All you need to get started is a list of tuples representing your edges.
title: Getting Started
name: krt_getting_started

title: Ref:  Swiss Army Knife for slicing arrays and dicts
